div.div: TSD Updates Regarding the Corona Virus

div.img:
Telluride School District steps in place:
1. Schools may be closed but learning is open. Students have their devices and online tools. Daily communication from teachers specific to classes/courses is ongoing.
2. Schoology and PowerSchool will keep students and parents informed. If a parent needs an account or help with their account, please contact Chris Delaney-Haynes.
3. Most parents are receiving emails, phone, and/or text messages through TSD's SchoolMessenger. If you have not opted in for SMS Text Messaging, please read this flyer for more information.
4. Susan Lilly,designated PIO, is posting frequent Facebook posts regarding what is being done.
For up-to-date information go to San Miguel County Corona Virus.
